Class JSlideShow

      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              fr.umlv.jphoto.cela.ui.JSlideShow
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Runnable
public class JSlideShow
extends javax.swing.JComponent
implements java.lang.Runnable

Show a slideshow. JSlideShow is a JCOmponent with the method paintComponent wich is redefine.
